attributes.action: Stop the supply of E10 petrol.
attributes.additional_details:
E10 is not economical 
E10 burns faster which makes us fill up more often. 

You say the e10 fuel is more economical yet you sell it at the same price!?

I used to get 400 miles out of my car on a full tank.
If I use e10 petrol I get 310miles. 

There is no point in having this e10 petrol if we have to use more to get the same results as the normal fuel we had before 
 
Lack of power too.

Think about the average hard working person, who will not be able to afford an Electric car.
attributes.background:
Stop e10 petrol as it does not help the environment. 
E10 petrol burns faster in our cars therefor giving us drivers poor fuel consumption and making us use more fuel! 

Scrap the E10 fuel.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596189
